SELECT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, P.P_STAR, P.P_MAPY, P.P_MAPX, MAX(A.ROOM_PRICE) AS ROOM_PRICE, WM_CONCAT(A.ROOM_TYPE) AS ROOM_TYPE, MAX(A.ROOM_OPTION) AS ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P INNER JOIN P_ROOMTYPE A ON P.ROOM_ID = A.ROOM_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
AND A.ROOM_CAPACITY >= '${ROOM_CAPACITY}'
GROUP BY P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, P.P_MAPY, P.P_MAPX, P.P_STAR

SELECT DISTINCT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, A.ROOM_PRICE, A.ROOM_TYPE, A.ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P, P_ROOMTYPE A WHERE P.P_ID = A.P_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
ORDER BY A.ROOM_PRICE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, A.ROOM_PRICE, A.ROOM_TYPE, A.ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P, P_ROOMTYPE A WHERE P.P_ID = A.P_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
ORDER BY A.ROOM_PRICE DESC
